General.Name: BlockMint Technologies Inc
General.Description: BlockMint Technologies Inc., through its subsidiaries, develops distributed systems and networks for decentralized deployment of blockchain based applications. The company operates its Bitcoin cryptocurrency mining hardware; and provides a Minter browser, a web browser where users can mine cryptocurrency. The company is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1J5
